hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:"I heard that Messenger of Allah say: 'Land game is permissible for you so long as you do not hunt it, and it is not hunted for you.'" (Daif) Abu Abdur Rahman (An-Nasai) said: 'Amar bin Abi Amr Is not strong in Hadith, even they Malik reported from him

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا أَشَارَ الْمُحْرِمُ إِلَى الصَّيْدِ فَقَتَلَهُ الْحَلاَلُ .
chapter.eng-name: If A Muhrim Points Out Game And A Non-Muhrim Kills It
